/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop for the urban landscape below. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of daily life in Beijing. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
